title: Three-Stage Perception Architecture

problem.en: Complex AI agents struggle with unstructured inputs. Without clear separation of concerns, agents become monolithic and difficult to debug, extend, or scale independently.
problem.ko: 복잡한 AI 에이전트는 비구조화된 입력으로 어려움을 겪습니다. 명확한 관심사 분리 없이는 에이전트가 모놀리식이 되어 디버그, 확장, 독립적 스케일링이 어려워집니다.

solution.en: Implement three-stage pipeline: Perception (input gathering/normalization), Processing (reasoning/decision-making), Action (execution in environment).
solution.ko: 3단계 파이프라인 구현: 인식(입력 수집/정규화), 처리(추론/의사결정), 행동(환경에서 실행).

code_example:
class ThreeStageAgent:
    def __init__(self):
        self.perception = PerceptionPipeline()
        self.processor = ProcessingPipeline()
        self.action = ActionPipeline()
    
    async def run(self, raw_input):
        # Stage 1: Perception
        perceived_data = await self.perception.process(raw_input)
        
        # Stage 2: Processing
        decisions = await self.processor.analyze(perceived_data)
        
        # Stage 3: Action
        results = await self.action.execute(decisions)
        
        return results
